import details from '../pages/Home'


export default async function coordinates (details) {
    // GeoApify gets Lat/Long
    const geoFetch = await fetch(`https://api.geoapify.com/v1/geocode/search?city=${city}&state=${state}&format=json&apiKey=27a84d7b0c1b4d52b41acc3e82bbe239`)

    const lat = ''
    const lon = ''

    const city = details.city
    const state = details.state

    geoFetch()
    .then(res => res.json())
    .then(res => lat.push(res.lat.value))
    .then(res => lon.push(res.lon.value))
    .then(console.log(lat, lon))
    console.log (city)
}


module.exports = [coordinates, lat, lon]
